channel.title: US Stock Ranking on FinanClub

item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: ORCL (Oracle Corporation) Mega Oracle’s recent developments in generative AI and recognition by Gartner indicate a positive outlook for the stock, but investors should be cautious and consider the short-term risks. TME (Tencent Music Entertainment Group) Middle Tencent Music Entertainment Group (TME) has the potential to navigate industry challenges through its focus on online music entertainment, strategic partnerships, and talent engagement, but risks such as leadership changes and revenue pressure should be monitored closely.
